page.title: 05Games
page.content: Where I live we play Tim Tam Tommy.It is the same as hide and seek but you have to try and catch someone.Who ever you catch they count in the next game. Sometimes no one gets caught and the same person has to count again.There are lots of places to hide.The person who counts has to have a good eye sight because when we play at night its hard to see them.We also count at the lamp-post.Some of the places we hide in are behind cars,in gardens,up lamp-posts,in the old peoples flats and up trees.I like this game very much,it is easy to play.
